com.peterson.markovchain.io

Class GSONMarkovIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peterson.markovchain.io.GSONMarkovIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarkovLoader, MarkovSaver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalFileGSONMarkovIO

    public abstract class GSONMarkovIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements MarkovLoader, MarkovSaver
    A GSON implementation of MarkovLoader and MarkovSaver. This converts the existing markov chain to JSON and back. This also is abstract to allow for flexible loading schemes (local file, JSON response, etc.) Created by Ryan Peterson on 11/07/2015
